title: Thanksgiving Education, T-Day Family Members, Turkey Talk, Holiday Breakup Timing and more.
itunes:title: Thanksgiving Education, T-Day Family Members, Turkey Talk, Holiday Breakup Timing and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Clearly he is not the Lord. Americans have gone from the pants party to the hand party. DAMN!!! Steve has a specific rule about Thanksgiving Prayer. Tommy's Turkey Tips are right here. What are some of the weirdest eating habits that are seen from Thanksgiving guests? There are three major holidays coming up and we see right here when is the best time to end a relationship. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve reminds us that God knows what he is doing. Just be patient!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
